original_title: Extreme Sports: Paragliding, Surfing, Climbing Like You've Never Seen Them Before!
overview: Whether you're an extreme sports pro, a wannabe or just an armchair adventurer, this transcontinental journey will fulfill your passion. The 10,000-mile journey from Canada to Mexico features opportunities for virtually every extreme sport. Breathtaking scenery, from the Canadian Rockies to Mexican beaches, forms the backdrop for surfing, rock climbing, a world-record paraglide and more.
title: Extreme Sports: Paragliding, Surfing, Climbing Like You've Never Seen Them Before!
